description: [ (4th elementary symmetric function of P(n))/(3rd elementary symmetric function of P(n)) ], where P(n) = {1, p(1), p(2), ..., p(n-1)}, p(0) = 1.
comments: p(i) denotes the i-th prime and [...] the floor function. - M. F. Hasler, Dec 11 2007
prog: (PARI) /* symmetric polynomial of order n in X=[X1,...,XN] */ sympol(X,n,s)=forvec(i=vector(n,j,[1,#X]),s+=prod(k=1,n,X[i[k]]),2);s /* list of primes 0...n-1 with p(0)=1 */ P(n)=concat([1],vector(n-1,i,prime(i))) /* this sequence */ A024536(n) = sympol(P(n),4) \ sympol(P(n),3) \\ - M. F. Hasler, Dec 11 2007
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Extended (up to a(55)) by _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 11 2007
